data.text: Bai, Loo Mpeleteu alongela mpu'la panga mumasu'ba ga kuundi'la, bandu bi'ngi' baaileka imani ya kakape no bi'ngi'ya maloo go ku'pi'ya na mayi'gano ga masetani.
Mayi'gano kati go gabambiyilwa na bandu abu'su' na anapiki, bene mabinio gagaalabike kati gatiniyilwe na kyu'ma sene mwoto.
Bembe baakanikiya bandu kobeka no lya yakulya ya sampuli nsi'si', pamope no panga Nnu'ngu' aaumbike yakulya yi'lu' li'nga bandu babamwu'bi'lile no tanga ukweli bapoki na kunsukulu.
Kila saumbike Nnu'ngu' kinogau wala sakikanilwa ntu'pu', mana sapokelelwa kwa kunsukulu Nnu'ngu'.
Kwa mwanjaa, kwa ndi'la ya liyi'gi'yo lya Nnu'ngu' na kwo sali, kilyo sendapeleteka nnu'ngi' yake.
Mana waku'mbu'kiye alongo mayi'gi'yo go, waapanga wa ntumisi nnogau wa Kilisitu Yesu. Kai', waapanga ulelilwe wiso mumayi'gi'yo ga imani na kugakota goyi'ganilwe.
Lakini wikane munomuno u'mo ya kidunia ya kwai'mbu' yangali maana, ila ukasane bi'ngi'ya gapala Nnu'ngu'.

Kwa mwanjaa kwiyobeleka yi'ga ipate makakala kwendapwaika pasene, lakini kwiyobeleka bi'ngi'ya gapala Nnu'ngu' kubi na pwaila mumakowe goti ga ukoto wa nambi'yambi' na ga nsimu wawaaisa, kati mwalagi Nnu'ngu'.
Alyo likowe lyo aminika, kai' lipalikwa liyi'ki'ti'lwe mpamo.
Natwenga kwa kitumbu sa li', twendakasana kwa mwanjaa tubi'i liu'bi'lyo litu kwa Nnu'ngu' ywabile mwu'mi, nga nkosopoli wa bandu boti, munomuno kwa balu' babau'bi'lile.
Ago nga mayi'gi'yo gaupalikwa kugalagya na kugayi'gana.
Mundu ywoywoti kaneausalawe unsembe wako, ila ube wa mundu wo yigilwa na babau'bi'lya kwa nnongelo wako na nnyendo wako, upendo na imani, na upeleteu.
Paunili'nda mpaka isa kwangu', witoleye kwasomya bandu Maandiko Mapeleteu ku'no kawakangamaya myoyo na kwayi'gana.
Uku'mbu'ki tumya upo ya kiloo yopeyilwe kwa malobe ga alondoli ba Nnu'ngu', palu' pawabi'kilwe maboko ga api'ndo ba kanisa.
Ukasane kugapanga go kwa mwoyo wako woti, li'nga bandu boti bakubone mwoyendelya ku'la.
Wili'ndi'le wenga wamwene na mayi'gano gako. Mana upangite nnyo, waalu'a kwikosopolya wamwene na balu' babakupi'kania.
